metadata.title: CVE-2019-10163 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Vulnerability has been found in PowerDNS Authoritative Server beforeversions 4.1.9, 4.0.8 allowing a remote, authorized master server to causea high CPU load or even prevent any further updates to any slave zone bysending a large number of NOTIFY messages. Note that only serversconfigured as slaves are affected by this issue.

criterions.comment: pdns package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
